name: hlcompl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, cfv(ccau, c2))), wcel(c1, cdm(cfv(clm, c3))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CHilOLD ∧ c1 ∈(Cau ` c2))→ c1 ∈ dom((~~>t ` c3)))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, cfv(ccau, c2)), wcel(c1, cdm(cfv(clm, c3))), wcel(c2, cfv(ccmet, cfv(cba, c0))))
stmt.pretty: sylan(c0 ∈ CHilOLD, c1 ∈(Cau ` c2), c1 ∈ dom((~~>t ` c3)), c2 ∈(CMet `(BaseSet ` c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, cfv(ccau, c2))), wcel(c1, cdm(cfv(clm, c3))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c2, cfv(ccmet, cfv(cba, c0))))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, cfv(ccmet, cfv(cba, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(ccau, c2))), wcel(c1, cdm(cfv(clm, c3))))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CHilOLD ∧ c1 ∈(Cau ` c2))→ c1 ∈ dom((~~>t ` c3)))
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c2 ∈(CMet `(BaseSet ` c0)))
⊣ ((c2 ∈(CMet `(BaseSet ` c0))∧ c1 ∈(Cau ` c2))→ c1 ∈ dom((~~>t ` c3)))

body.pretty:

⊣ c2 =(IndMet ` c0)
